moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed.

moves.name: Hang in There!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

passives.name: Sand Shelter
passives.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from a sandstorm.

passives.name: Stamina Reserves 2
passives.description: Once per battle, charges the user’s move gauge by two when the user is in a pinch.

passives.name: Sands of Time 1
passives.description: Quickly charges the move gauge in a sandstorm.
